headline: Electronic Arts Inc. (EA): Among the Best Esports Stocks to Buy Now
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 10 Best Esports Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Electronic Arts Inc. (NASDAQ:EA) stands against the other esports stocks. The esports industry is witnessing significant growth and is expected to continue growing. The COVID-19 pandemic fueled the trend […]
